description: Implemented the Unified Omni-Island control system with adaptive sizing, Safe Release touch logic, and Symmetrical Bloom navigation.
achievements: Unified navigation and transport into a single bottom-center Omni-Island capsule.
Developed 'Safe Release' touch engine with coordinate-based zone detection and drag-to-cancel support.
Established 'Subtle Inflation' professional feedback pattern (breath animation).
Optimized hitboxes with a 20px invisible safety margin for zero-miss interaction.
Refined Symmetrical Bloom layout with 7-position uniform grid and empty center anchor.
